stories.headline: Farmers in Gaza risk Israeli bullets to bring their fields back to life
stories.description: Gaza farmers face risks as Israeli buffer zones expand into their agricultural lands under heavy military control.

stories.headline: Four years of war in Ukraine: How ordinary lives were turned upside down
stories.description: Six Ukrainian men and women in uniform reveal how Russia's invasion in 2022 has changed them.

stories.headline: Clashes in Albania as protesters demand PM Rama resign
stories.description: Violence breaks out near parliament as demonstrators demand accountability in a corruption investigation.

stories.headline: UK weighs removing ex-Prince Andrew from succession line amid Epstein probe
stories.description: The report comes as police widen investigations into former prince, including questioning his close protection teams.

stories.headline: Gunmen on motorcycles kill at least 50 in northwest Nigeria: Report
stories.description: Nigerian lawmaker reports ‘at least 50 people dead’ after attack as list of missing is still being compiled.
